page.title: 09Tourists in Rye
page.content: We went to Rye to do a survey on the tourists there. The people that we surveyed mostly came from other parts of England and a lot of people came because of the historical town. All the people we surveyed found the town interesting and most of them would come again. Most of the people liked the town and the old buildings and quite a few liked the cobbled streets. We enjoyed finding out what other people thought of Rye. Rye Parish Church is very poular with the tourists. In 1984, 540,000 people signed the visitors' book and they represented 135 different countries.
